title: Data and Code for: Lack of Selection and Limits to Delegation: Firm Dynamics in Developing Countries
creator: Ufuk Akcigit
description: This project contains all the data and codes to replicate the analysis in "Lack of Selection and Limits to Delegation: Firm Dynamics in Developing Countries" by Ufuk Akcigit, Harun Alp and Michael Peters
subject: L25 Firm Performance: Size, Diversification, and Scope
O11 Macroeconomic Analyses of Economic Development
O40 Economic Growth and Aggregate Productivity: General
